attributes.action: Family not allowed to move in one bedroom flat renting in private properties.
attributes.additional_details: As I single mum need help and to be discussed in parliament with someone think that will help me and other single mum's and dad's in low income.
attributes.background: I want to be able to move in one bed property and I m not allowed to do that and I want to ask the government to change that to be able family's to share one bed property.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about what private properties to rent are a matter for prospective tenants, not the UK Government or Parliament.

If you need advice about your housing situation, you could contact Shelter, a charity that provides advice on housing. you can find out how to contact Shelter here: https://england.shelter.org.uk/get_help
